item.title: A New Day
item.description:
I’m migrating my blogging to Github Pages. The old posts from the Ghost blog may follow at some point: they’re in a sqlite3 database in HTML, so it’s not a big deal.

So I’m trying out this [Hugo]() “platform”: a static site generator written in Go. Go is the language I’ve been mostly working on this year and I’m lovin’ it.
